sen.j: 三野前国造（みののさきのくにのみやつこ・みののさきのこくぞう・みののみちのくちのくにのみやつこ・みののみちのくちこくぞう）は美濃国を支配した国造。
sen.e: Minonosakinokuninomiyatsuko 三野前国造 (also known as Minonosakinokokuzo, Minonomichinokuchinokuninomiyatsuko, and Minonomichinokuchikokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko ruled Mino Province.

Minonosakino kuninomiyatsuko 三野前国造 (also known as Minonosakinokokuzo, Minonomichinokuchi no kuninomiyatsuko, and Minonomichinokuchikokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled Mino Province.
sen.cmt: 表記変更local ruling families in ancient Japan を追加しました。
sen.e: Minonosakino kuninomiyatsuko 三野前国造 (also known as Minonosakinokokuzo, Minonomichinokuchi no kuninomiyatsuko, and Minonomichinokuchikokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled Mino Province.
It was also written as 美濃国造.
It was also written as 美濃国造.
It was also written as 美濃国造.

sen.j: 『国造本紀』によると八瓜入日子王が祖という。
sen.e: According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi", Yatsurinoirihikonomiko was the ancestor.
According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi," Yatsurinoirihiko no miko was the ancestor.
sen.cmt: 表記変更カンマの位置を調整
sen.e: According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi," Yatsurinoirihiko no miko was the ancestor.
The clan was supposed to be descended from Motosukuninomiyatsuko.
The clan was supposed to be descended from Motosu kuninomiyatsuko.
The clan was supposed to be descended from Motosu kuninomiyatsuko.
The Mino clan.

Kabane was Atai.
Kabane was Atai.

sen.j: 三野本巣氏なとと同系。
sen.e: The clan was descended from the same line as the Minomotosu clan.
The clan was descended from the same line as the Minomotosu clan.
The clan was descended from the same line as the Minomotosu clan.
Mino Province.

sen.j: 現在の岐阜県美濃地方。
sen.e: Present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.
Present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.
Present Mino area in Gifu Prefecture.

sen.j: 南宮大社の祭神の一つ見野命は祖神か。
sen.e: An enshrined deity of the Nangu-taisha Shrine, Minomikoto, is supposed to be the progenitor of the clan.
An enshrined deity of the Nangu-taisha Shrine, Mino mikoto, is supposed to be the progenitor of the clan.
